title: Certain Wordpress Buttons Not Displayed in Edit Draft Post Mode
content:
NOTE: I am using Firefox Extended Release Version: 115.23.1esr (64-bit)

_____

Hello,

When I edit a blog Post in Wordpress, there are critical buttons missing from the top-right of the screen, and only 2 of the buttons display, but even they are askew and out of place:

See Image #1.

_____

I have to use an old Brave browser to see the buttons:

See Image #2.

_____

Any help at getting this rectified would be great.

Thank you in advance.
creator: peterwilson411

title: tabs I do not have open appear below search window, how can I stop that’ for ‘Firefox
content:
tabs I do not have open appear below search window, how can I stop that’ for ‘Firefox?

Sites I do have open are at the top, that's all I need, this extra vector of links I don't want now clutters by screen and may be using my resources.

title: How to prevent updating Firefox if that would result in breaking an extension
content:

Thanks, Mark.

title: Website not working properly in Firefox
content:
Hi, I am trying to get this website to work properly in Firefox. When I move my cursor on the chart, it doesn't work properly. I've tried reproducing the issue on Chrome, but the chart works properly there. I was wondering if you are able to reproduce this issue using Firefox. Thank you for your support.

https://www.accuweather.com/en/us/new-york/10021/biking-weather/349727
creator: mstrojny

title: Unable to block images in Firefox 138.3 (55650)
content:
I am currently running Firefox version 138. In previous versions of Firefox for iPadOS, there was a setting labeled "Block images. When turned on, it would block images from loading on web pages. In the current version, I am unable to locate this option anymore.

My questions are: 1. Is this option now located elsewhere, or has it been removed entirely? 2. If it is still available, how do you access it? 3. If it is gone, how do we ask Mozilla to bring it back?

I will appreciate any help you can offer on this question.
creator: skykimball
